name: between worlds (ec3938, az2306, mads101)
description:
An assignment for NYU's Spring 2023 Game Design Class created by Anna Zheng, Evie Cundy, and Madison Shimbo

CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to interact
  • X to open inventory
  • Q to reset moveable items
  • R to reset your position to spawn (debugging)

Slides

Assets created by Evie

Font from https://mounirtohami.itch.io/pixel-art-gui-elements
